name: Launch & Merge: Fuse Ballz
description:
Launch & Merge - A Merging Puzzle Game great way to merge colours and number match 3.

When the same numbers are attached this way, they will be merged and added up to score. Try to make a tile F to proof you are brilliant and complete with others.

Develop a strategy, anticipate inconvenient domino blocks, enjoy the slushy dice merges and become the master of Launch & Merge Puzzle!

Launch & Merge is an enticing and joyful brain training puzzle, where you have to match 3 Merge circles to fuse into a higher number merged circle. It is a fun, simple to learn, colorful, addicting block puzzle and a great IQ exercise suitable for all ages!
